greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) is the GCD of the sum of largest prime factors of numbers from 1 to n and of the sum of smallest prime factors of numbers from 1 to n.
link: Michael De Vlieger, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: GCD @@@ Transpose[{Accumulate[Prepend[First /@ #, 0]], Accumulate[Prepend[Last /@ #, 0]]}] &@ Map[First /@ FactorInteger@ # &, Range[2, 103]] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Dec 15 2015 *)
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Oct 22 2003
